name: Cern Root debs for Ubuntu/64 and 32bits
short_description:
FOR DETAILED INFORMATION GO TO http://cernrootdebs.sourceforge.net

Packages of Cern Root software for Ubuntu/64/32bits. This package is going to be installed on /usr/local. Enabled: minuit2 roofit unuran tmva

from 5.34.01 Enabled support for asimage, astiff, builtin_afterimage, builtin_lzma, cintex, explicitlink, fftw3, fitsio, gviz, genvector, krb5, ldap, mathmore, memstat, minuit2, mysql, opengl, python, reflex, roofit, shadowpw, shared, ssl, tmva, unuran, x11, xft, xml.
